ray.rage.rendersystem

Interface RenderSystem.Capabilities

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GL4RenderSystemCaps
    Enclosing interface:
    RenderSystem

    public static interface RenderSystem.Capabilities
    The capabilities represent a description of the attributes supported by a render-system.
    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera
